demo.name: brd4185a.demo.ncp_aoa_locator
demo.label: Bluetooth - NCP AoA locator
demo.model:description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application extended with CTE Receiver support. It enables Angle of Arrival (AoA) calculation. Use this application with Direction Finding host examples.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ncp_empty
demo.label: Bluetooth - NCP Empty
demo.model:description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application. Runs the Bluetooth stack and provides access to it by exposing the Bluetooth API (BGAPI) via UART connection. NCP mode makes it possible to run your application on a host controller or PC. This example contains a minimal GATT database, and cannot be used with host applications that use Dynamic GATT API.

demo.name: brd4100a.demo.ncp
demo.label: Bluetooth - NCP
demo.model:description: Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application. Runs the Bluetooth stack and provides access to it by exposing the Bluetooth API (BGAPI) via UART connection. NCP mode makes it possible to run your application on a host controller or PC. This example does not have a GATT database, but makes it possible to build one from the application using Dynamic GATT API.

demo.name: brd4184a.demo.soc_aoa_asset_tag
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC AoA Asset Tag
demo.model:description: This sample app demonstrates a CTE (Constant Tone Extension) transmitter that can be used as an asset tag in a Direction Finding setup estimating Angle of Arrival (AoA).

demo.name: brd4184b.demo.soc_aoa_asset_tag
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC AoA Asset Tag
demo.model:description: This sample app demonstrates a CTE (Constant Tone Extension) transmitter that can be used as an asset tag in a Direction Finding setup estimating Angle of Arrival (AoA).

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.soc_blinky
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Blinky
demo.model:description: The classic blinky example using Bluetooth communication. From the EFR Connect mobile app, the LED controller button toggles LED0 on the board. In addition, on the board pressing or releasing BTN0 notifies the app. This is a demonstration of a simple two-way data exchange over GATT.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.soc_xg24_dev_kit_brd2601b
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC EFR32xG24 Dev Kit (BRD2601B)
demo.model:description: Demonstrates the features of the EFR32xG24 Dev Kit Board. This can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd4164a.demo.soc_light_rail_dmp_micriumos
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Light RAIL DMP Micrium OS

model:property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Light RAIL DMP Micrium OS

demo.model:description: This is a Dynamic Multiprotocol reference application demonstrating a light bulb that can be switched both via Bluetooth and via a Proprietary protocol. To switch it via Bluetooth use the Wireless Gecko smartphone app. To switch it via Proprietary protocol use the Flex (RAIL) - Switch sample app.

demo.name: brd4180b.demo.soc_thermometer_mock
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer (Mock)
demo.model:description: Implements a GATT Server with the Health Thermometer Profile, which enables a Client device to connect and get temperature data. Temperature is read from the mock relative humidity and temperature sensor.

demo.name: brd4181b.demo.soc_thermometer_mock
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer (Mock)
demo.model:description: Implements a GATT Server with the Health Thermometer Profile, which enables a Client device to connect and get temperature data. Temperature is read from the mock relative humidity and temperature sensor.

demo.name: brd4308b.demo.soc_thermometer_mock
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer (Mock)
demo.model:description: Implements a GATT Server with the Health Thermometer Profile, which enables a Client device to connect and get temperature data. Temperature is read from the mock relative humidity and temperature sensor.

demo.name: brd4314a.demo.soc_thermometer_mock

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.soc_thermometer
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thermometer
demo.model:description: Implements a GATT Server with the Health Thermometer Profile, which enables a Client device to connect and get temperature data. Temperature is read from the Si7021 digital relative humidity and temperature sensor of the WSTK or of the Thunderboard.

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.soc_throughput_display
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Throughput
demo.model:description: This example tests the throughput capabilities of the device and can be used to measure throughput between 2 *EFR32* devices, as well as between a device and a smartphone using EFR Connect mobile app, through the Throughput demo tile.

demo.name: brd4184a.demo.soc_thunderboard_brd4184a
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thunderboard EFR32BG22 (BRD4184A)
demo.model:description: Demonstrates the features of the Thunderboard EFR32BG22 Kit. This can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd4184b.demo.soc_thunderboard_brd4184b
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thunderboard EFR32BG22 (BRD4184B)
demo.model:description: Demonstrates the features of the Thunderboard EFR32BG22 Kit. This can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd4166a.demo.soc_thunderboard_brd4166a
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Thunderboard Sense 2
demo.model:description: Demonstrates the features of the Thunderboard Sense 2 Kit. This can be tested with the EFR Connect mobile app.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.soc_voice
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Voice
demo.model:description: Voice over Bluetooth Low Energy sample application. It is supported by Thunderboard Sense 2 and Thunderboard EFR32BG22 boards and demonstrates how to send voice data over GATT, which is acquired from the on-board microphones.

demo.name: brd4166a.demo.soc_voice
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Voice
demo.model:description: Voice over Bluetooth Low Energy sample application. It is supported by Thunderboard Sense 2 and Thunderboard EFR32BG22 boards and demonstrates how to send voice data over GATT, which is acquired from the on-board microphones.

demo.name: brd4184b.demo.soc_voice
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Voice
demo.model:description: Voice over Bluetooth Low Energy sample application. It is supported by Thunderboard Sense 2 and Thunderboard EFR32BG22 boards and demonstrates how to send voice data over GATT, which is acquired from the on-board microphones.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.soc_ibeacon
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC iBeacon
demo.model:description: An iBeacon device implementation that sends non-connectable advertisements in iBeacon format. The iBeacon Service gives Bluetooth accessories a simple and convenient way to send iBeacons to smartphones. This example can be tested together with the EFR Connect mobile app.
